Detailed Description

Abstract class for a message filter.

A message filter has first-pass handling of messages before their destination message handlers. They are associated with channels.

They may or may not decide to pass, alter the message to the handler. One example of use is to implement rate-limiting of message dispatches, where message handling can be deferred.

Message filters are reference-counted.
